title: HangarX
description:
HangarX is dedicated to becoming the premier platform in the web3 gaming space. 
Our mission is to create a vibrant platform where simplicity, innovation, and creativity converge to offer exceptional value to the gaming community. With diverse game genres, seamless integration via Telegram Mini Apps, and a Gaming Social hub, we make it easy for gamers to play & earn rewards. Join us to redefine the web3 gaming experience!
